body_html:
@MlWoo did you look at my comment here: #6940 (comment)

The explicit constraint to enforce is that we cant have different RNG if we compile with MKL and without MKL, i.e. for the same random seed you cant have different numbers come out based on other factors like AVX-availability or MKL-availability.

Is there a way to rewrite this code with this in mind.
